content: these quick & easy sunshine coasters are great accessories to your spring & summer decor make them in traditional sun colors or shake things up a bit and make them in other fun spring/summer colors they would make great housewarming or hostess gifts as well market items materials ▸yarn 100% cotton ▸yardage ~20-24 yards per coaster ▸hook 5 0 mm *contact the designer * https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2023
